game.title: The Missing Princess
game.objective: Find the missing princess and return her to the castle.
game.description: The princess has been kidnapped by an evil wizard and taken to his castle. You must find her and bring her back before it's too late.
game.reward: A large sum of gold and the princess's hand in marriage.

task.description: The wizard's castle is hidden deep in the forest. You must search until you find it.
Once you have found the wizard's castle, you must defeat him in battle.
After you have defeated the wizard, you must rescue the princess.

task.objective: Return the princess to the castle.
task.description: Once you have rescued the princess, you must return her to the castle.
